page.title: 01BLOCK 05360168 - BECKENHAM
page.content: This block covers part of the {Beckenham and Shortlands}areas of S.E. London. These areas are part of the London Borough of{Bromley.}The area is mainly residential, although there are a number of open spaces, both privately and publicly owned, the largest of which is{Beckenham Place {Park.}This Park includes woodlands, public football pitches and tennis courts, and an 18 hole golf course. The main shopping area is Beckenham High Street, but this is relatively small, eg there are no department stores. For major purchases shoppers go to Bromley, Croydon or Central London. Most of the residents are middle class.
